column4: Hi guys, I have a big problem!!!! I need to know, if there is any flash drive USB that works on Ubuntu (I need a wifi USB device)
almost all USB memory flash drives work.  Some usb wireless devices work zero config.
but I need it for internet... To conect to a wireless router.
I had one time ago, and did not work... I'm not speaking about storage, I'm speaking about the device that helps you to go wireless connection to a wi-fi router
